---
--- Generated by libin
--- File name : experience_system.lua.txt
--- DataTime : 2022/07/05
--- Description : 历练系统
---

local experience_play_type = enum.experience.experience_play_type
local battle_ready_close_type = enum.experience.battle_ready_close_type

---@class experience_system
local experience_system = class("experience_system")

--region base api

---构造函数
---@protected
function experience_system:ctor()
    self.play_type = experience_play_type.NONE;
    
    self.battle_ready_close_type = battle_ready_close_type.NORMAL 
end

---销毁
---@public
function experience_system:dispose()
    self.play_type = nil
    self.battle_ready_close_type = nil
end


--endregion

--region logic

---设置当前历练中的玩法
---@public
---@param type experience_play_type
function experience_system:set_cur_play_type(type)
    self.play_type = type
end

---获得当前历练玩法
---@public
---@return experience_system
function experience_system:get_cur_play_type()
    return self.play_type
end

---@public
---@param type battle_ready_close_type
function experience_system:set_close_type(type)
    self.battle_ready_close_type = type
end

---@public
---@return battle_ready_close_type
function experience_system:get_close_type()
    return self.battle_ready_close_type
end

---@public
function experience_system:clear_close_type()
    self.battle_ready_close_type = nil
end



--endregion


return experience_system
